summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2010 VOLKSWAGEN JETTA. THE CONTACT STATED THERE WAS A MOMENTARY DELAY IN THE VEHICLE HORN RESPONSE. THE DEALER VERIFIED THERE WAS A BRIEF DELAY IN THE HORN RESPONSE BUT WOULD NOT PROVIDE ASSISTANCE WITH REPAIRS.   VW CORPORATE INFORMED THE CONSUMER THE HORN WAS DESIGNED WITH THE DELAY. UPDATED EVOQ 10/22/10*JB
